sense.gloss: to lift up, to hold up, to raise
to give, to present, to offer

sdata.j: ご↑返事↑↓へんじ↓を|さし↑上↑↓あ↓げる|↑前↑↓まえ↓によく↑考↑↓かんが↓えましょう。
sdata.e: I must think it over before answering you.

sdata.j: ↑突然↑↓とつぜん↓にかような↑奇↑↓き↓↑怪↑↓かい↓な↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑差↑↓|さ↓し↑上↑↓あ↓げる|↑非礼↑↓ひれい↓をお↑許↑↓ゆる↓し↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please forgive my impoliteness in sending you suddenly such a strange letter.
